verses.verse: Then Samuel <S%H8050><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a vial <S%H6378><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>, and poured <S%H3332><s%> it upon his head <S%H7218><s%>, and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, and said, Is it not because the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has anointed <S%H4886><s%> you to be captain <S%H5057><s%> over his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>?

When you are departed <S%H3212><s%> from me <S%H5978><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%>, then you shall find <S%H4672><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> by Rachel <S%H7354><s%>'s tomb <S%H6900><s%> in the border <S%H1366><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> at Zelzah <S%H6766><s%>; and they will say <S%H559><s%> unto you <S%H860><s%>, The donkeys which you went <S%H1980><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> are found <S%H4672><s%>: and <S%H1><s%>, behold, your father has left <S%H5203><s%> the care <S%H1697><s%> of the donkeys <S%H860><s%>, and sorrows <S%H1672><s%> for you <S%H559><s%>, saying, What shall I do <S%H6213><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%>?

Then shall you go on <S%H2498><s%> forward <S%H1973><s%> from there <S%H935><s%>, and you shall come to the plain <S%H436><s%> of Tabor <S%H8396><s%>, and there shall meet <S%H4672><s%> you three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> going up <S%H5927><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> to Beth <S%H1008><s%>â€“el, one <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> kids <S%H1423><s%>, and another <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> loaves <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, and another <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> a bottle <S%H5035><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%>:
And they will <S%H7592><s%> greet <S%H7965><s%> you <S%H5414><s%>, and give you two <S%H8147><s%> loaves of bread <S%H3899><s%>; which you shall receive <S%H3947><s%> of their hands <S%H3027><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> that you shall come <S%H935><s%> to the hill <S%H1389><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, where is the garrison <S%H5333><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>: and it shall come to pass <S%H935><s%>, when you are come there to the city <S%H5892><s%>, that you shall meet <S%H6293><s%> a company <S%H2256><s%> of prophets <S%H5030><s%> coming down <S%H3381><s%> from the high place <S%H1116><s%> with a psaltery <S%H5035><s%>, and a tambourine <S%H8596><s%>, and a pipe <S%H2485><s%>, and a harp <S%H3658><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H5012><s%>; and they shall prophesy:

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H6743><s%> upon you <S%H5012><s%>, and you shall prophesy with them <S%H2015><s%>, and shall be turned into another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.
And let it be <S%H226><s%>, when these signs are come <S%H935><s%> unto you <S%H6213><s%>, that you do as occasion <S%H4672><s%> serve <S%H3027><s%> you <S%H430><s%>; for God is with you.

And you shall go down <S%H3381><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me to Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>; and <S%H3381><s%>, behold, I will come down unto you <S%H5927><s%>, to offer burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and to sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>: seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall you stay <S%H3176><s%>, until I come <S%H935><s%> to you <S%H3045><s%>, and show you what you shall do <S%H6213><s%>.

And it was so <S%H6437><s%>, that when he had turned his back <S%H7926><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> from Samuel <S%H8050><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H2015><s%> him another <S%H312><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>: and all those signs <S%H226><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to pass that day <S%H3117><s%>.

And when they came <S%H935><s%> there to the hill <S%H1389><s%>, behold <S%H2256><s%>, a company of prophets <S%H5030><s%> met <S%H7125><s%> him <S%H7307><s%>; and the Spirit of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H6743><s%> upon him <S%H5012><s%>, and he prophesied among them <S%H8432><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3045><s%>, when all that knew him previously <S%H865><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H5012><s%>, behold, he prophesied among the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, then the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H7453><s%>, What is this that is come unto the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%>? Is Saul <S%H7586><s%> also among the prophets <S%H5030><s%>?

And one <S%H376><s%> of the same place answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, But who is their father <S%H1><s%>? Therefore it became a proverb <S%H4912><s%>, Is Saul <S%H7586><s%> also among the prophets <S%H5030><s%>?
And when he had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of prophesying <S%H5012><s%>, he came <S%H935><s%> to the high place <S%H1116><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s uncle <S%H1730><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him and to his servant <S%H5288><s%>, Where <S%H575><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> you <S%H559><s%>? And he said, To seek <S%H1245><s%> the donkeys <S%H860><s%>: and when we saw <S%H7200><s%> that they were no where <S%H369><s%>, we came <S%H935><s%> to Samuel <S%H8050><s%>.
And Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s uncle <S%H1730><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Tell <S%H5046><s%> me <S%H8050><s%>, I pray you, what Samuel said unto you <S%H559><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his uncle <S%H1730><s%>, He told <S%H5046><s%> us plainly <S%H5046><s%> that the donkeys <S%H860><s%> were found <S%H4672><s%>. But of the matter <S%H1697><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4410><s%>, whereof Samuel <S%H8050><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%>, he told him not <S%H5046><s%>.
And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> called <S%H6817><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to Mizpeh <S%H4709><s%>;

And said <S%H559><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, I brought up <S%H5927><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, and out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of all kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>, and of them that oppressed you <S%H3905><s%>:

And you have this day <S%H3117><s%> rejected <S%H3988><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, who himself saved <S%H3467><s%> you out of all your adversities <S%H7451><s%> and your tribulations <S%H6869><s%>; and you have said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H7760><s%>, No, but set a king <S%H4428><s%> over us <S%H3320><s%>. Now therefore present yourselves before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> by your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, and by your thousands <S%H505><s%>.
And when Samuel <S%H8050><s%> had caused all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to come near <S%H7126><s%>, the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%>.

When he had caused the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> to come near <S%H7126><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>, the family <S%H4940><s%> of Matri <S%H4309><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%>, and Saul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%>: and when they sought <S%H1245><s%> him <S%H4672><s%>, he could not be found.

Therefore they inquired <S%H7592><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> further <S%H376><s%>, if the man should yet come <S%H935><s%> there <S%H1988><s%>. And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H2244><s%>, he has hid himself among the stuff <S%H3627><s%>.

And they ran <S%H7323><s%> and fetched <S%H3947><s%> him there <S%H3320><s%>: and when he stood among <S%H8432><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, he was higher <S%H1361><s%> than any of the people <S%H5971><s%> from his shoulders <S%H7926><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>.

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all the people <S%H5971><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%> you him whom the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%>, that there is none like him among all the people <S%H5971><s%>? And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shouted <S%H7321><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, God save <S%H2421><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>.

Then Samuel <S%H8050><s%> told <S%H1696><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> the manner <S%H4941><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4410><s%>, and wrote <S%H3789><s%> it in a book <S%H5612><s%>, and laid it up <S%H3240><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>. And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> away <S%H7971><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> also went <S%H1980><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> to Gibeah <S%H1390><s%>; and there went <S%H3212><s%> with him a band of men <S%H2428><s%>, whose hearts <S%H3820><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had touched <S%H5060><s%>.

But the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Belial <S%H1100><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, How shall this man save <S%H3467><s%> us <S%H959><s%>? And they despised him <S%H935><s%>, and brought him no presents <S%H4503><s%>. But he held his peace <S%H2790><s%>.
